# Changelog

## 1.1
- Non-blocking IR transmission
- Improved state serialization with last_active_mode
- Fixed UI display and input handling
- CI/CD workflow improvements

## 1.0
- Initial release
- Full HTW AC IR protocol support
- All AC modes, fan speeds, temperature control
- Toggle functions (Swing, Turbo, Fresh, LED, Clean)
- Timer scheduling (0.5h - 24h)
- Settings persistence to SD card
